participant_1.background:
I treasure the watch my father gave me for my birthday because it is a reminder of our relationship.
I baked a lot of cakes for my family and friends last year.
i love to read and cook.
I broke my arm when I was a child, but it healed well.
since i have fibromyalgia , the harsher winters here in pa will be rough on me.

participant_2.background:
I love my cat, he's always there to greet me after a workout.
both my parents are creative.
i am currently trying to open my own grocery store.
i watch jimmy fallon s show every night.
i go to at least 10 concerts a year.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
It is going well, thank you! I am trying to bake a cake.
Oh, how fun! I love baking! What kind of cake are you making?
I am trying to make a chocolate cake. I am not very good at it though.
I am sure it will be delicious! What is your favorite thing to cook?
I like to make soups, especially in the winter.
I love soups too! They are so comforting.
I also love to read. I love to read books about history.
I love to read too! I like to read books about mystery and suspense.
I also love to watch TV. I like to watch comedies and reality shows.
I also love to watch TV! I like to watch dramas and reality shows.
That is great! I love finding people with similar interests.
I agree! It is always nice to meet new people.
